column5: Just wondering if there are any places near hamilton where i could get out and wet a line for a few hours today????!!!!  i didnt buy my hut to use on the nice calm days  thanks mike
Most of the ponds I know in Niagara had lost most of their ice with the rain.  Nothing safe to my knowledge.
I'll find out if there is ice on Valens.  Anyone wanna fish it on Sunday??
Oh yeah!!!!   5" solid ice.   Who's in??  I've never fished it before and would love to try it.     Cheers!

I am yet to try valens out but i am very interested as i have heard there were alot of nice pike and crappie iced in past years.  you headin ouut for sure iceslayer???  if so and the storm is no worse than today i am in !!!!!!! anyone else interested????   mike
Valens has tiny little 12" Pike (if yer lucky) and Sunfish. What self respectin' man would admit to fishing fer kiddy fish.
sure beats sitting in my hut in the basement!!!!!! LOL

if that is the link to the ice fishing game i already have downloaded  it and i love it!!!!!  it is a very well thought out game in my opinion and suprisingly good graphics!!!  i was trying to figure out how to start a network game but it didnt happen lol there is an option for an internet game but it can not be clicked.....anyone else tried this????  great link clamp-it!!!! thanks for sharing
I think that the only safe ice near Hamilton is floating in my rye and ginger as we speak. Cheers!!! Jim
Oh, that crossed my mind as well!
